info.title: Invoice
info.description: An invoice is created by sending an http POST to https://bips.me/api/v1/invoice containing the details of your product or service, price and the currency. On a successful POST an invoice URL will be received in the response. Your system should redirect to this URL to allow the customer to pay.

post.description: An invoice is created by sending an http POST to https:// bips.me /api/v1/invoice
